Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
animation.AnimationAnimations are sequences of images and the logic needed to know when, where, and how to display them
block.BlockBlocks are solid, nonmoving bits of terrain
camera.CameraThe camera is used to determine the center of the viewscreen
configmanager.ConfigManagerThis class loads general game configuration information (e.g
enveffect.EnvEffectEnvironmental effects are localized changes in physics or display
enveffectmanager.EnvEffectManagerThis class handles loading and caching information on enviromental effects
eventmanager.EventThis class represents a single input event
eventmanager.EventManagerThis class handles user input and other events
featuremanager.FeatureManagerThis class manages the different map feature modules in data/mapgen/features
imagemanager.ImageManagerThis class handles loading and display of images and fonts
line.LineLines are simple pairs of points
map.MapThe Map class handles creating, updating, and displaying the game map
physicsobject.PhysicsObjectPhysicsObject is the base class for objects that need to interact with other objects, like creatures, mechanisms, etc
mapgen.features.pit.PitWhen horizontal, this tunnel type puts a pit trap at the bottom and fills it with something unpleasant
platform.PlatformA simple container class for platforms that we plan to add to the map during mapgen
player.PlayerThe Player class handles the player's avatar in the game
polygon.PolygonThe Polygon class represents convex bounding polygons used for collision detection
prop.PropProps are background objects that have no influence on gameplay aside from simply looking pretty
propmanager.PropManagerThe PropManager class handles loading prop configuration and selection of props depending on terrain
quadtree.QuadTreeQuadTree instances are nodes in a recursive quad tree used to hold 2D objects
range1D.Range1DA Range1D is simply a one-dimensional range, used when projecting Polygon instances onto vectors
zone.RegionA Region is a specific portion of terrain within a given Zone
seed.SeedSeeds are used by the spacefilling automaton in map.expandSeeds()
soundmanager.SoundManagerThis class handles loading and playing of sound effects
sprite.SpriteSprites are display classes for handling dynamic game objects like creatures
mapgen.features.stairs.StairsTunnelAugment the floor of the tunnel with extra blocks to create a staircase
mapgen.features.straight.StraightTunnelThe basic tunnel type -- a straight tunnel from point A to point B
terrestrialobject.TerrestrialObjectTerrestrial objects are ones that walk around on the ground and can jump
treenode.TreeNodeTreeNodes are branches of a planar tree graph that are used to describe the high-level structure of the game map
mapgen.environments.water.WaterThis class defines an environmental effect that creates pools of water on the map
mapgen.features.wave.WaveTunnelCarve a sinusoidal wave tunnel from the self.sector's parent to its endpoint
zone.ZoneA Zone is a large-scale grouping of similar Region instances
